channel.title: Making items require membership in devo 2.7. REP
channel.description:
Hey well title says it all, will rep when I can.
I've made it so players arent automatically members on first login, so now how do i make it so that they need to be a member to wear stuff.
an example code would be good, i know all the ids of stuff i want reqs on so just need an example to learn from, thx.

item.title: Making items require membership in devo 2.7. REP
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Yw and don’t worry too much about rep.

Read full topic
item.source: Making items require membership in devo 2.7. REP

item.title: Making items require membership in devo 2.7. REP
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

John459:

http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=21871

Thx mate kinda sussed it lol,

if(playerIsMember == 0)
//    for(int i : Item.memItems)
        if(wearID == 1052) {
CAM().sendMessage("You must be a member to use this item.");
            return;
        }

It works for me thx again will rep when i can

Read full topic
